issue.title: Saving and restoration of window size & location

content.raw: Certainly possible. Qt has some things for remembering these settings (i.e it gives you long strings of bytes that represent current GUI state that you can save and load) without having to do them all manually, some would still be manual though. But yep, sounds fair enough.
